summary: Sonja, an exotic Red Headed She Devil ready to start her adventure!
descriptionHtml:
Sonja was my first character and I feel she is good enough to share.. Enjoy!

Lvl 1 save game just after execution.. sided with the stormcloaks as a true nord should ;-)

Required Mods:

ApachiiSkyHair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Coverwomen looks 2: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563

High Quality Eyes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498

More Hair Colors: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14713


Recommended Mods to make her look and feel exactly like in the screens:

ENB and high settings are very important to match the screens, enb used:
SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS FX - ENB: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/822

but any ENB will do!

CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible - CBBE skin texture v1_8 feminine arm toned abs PATCH (under optional files) (shown in new screens): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

Castanistic or Highelf style idle for females -replacer- (highelf): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15143

Feminine Running and New Dash Animation: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11447

Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272

GlossTech (gloss lvl 7): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5437

Armor:

LustDesign - Dovahkiin Mercenary Gear - CBBE v3 - (armor and weapons) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15804

Winter Is Coming - Cloaks - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486

Survivors Cuirass - CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9874

Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M (overwritten by: Remodeled Armor for CBBEv3 Bodyslide and BBP):

Install: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004

then install and replace with:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259



If you plan to used `showracemenu\' , the following attributes reset (skyrim bug) you will need this info:

Cheek color : +2
Cheek color lower : +2
Neck color : +1

Eye liner: +2
Eye shadow : +2
Eye tint : +1

Lip color : +1

Thanks! All comments and concerns are welcome :)
author: Squint583

files.name: Sonja with Survivor armor - mod required
